en.title: 5 Benefits of Keeping Cats Indoors: Why You Shouldn't Let Your Cat Outside
en.content:
Keeping cats exclusively indoors is the recommended approach for modern cat ownership. Here are five major benefits.

1. Zero Risk of Traffic Accidents

Traffic accidents are one of the leading causes of death for outdoor cats. Visibility is especially low at night and on rainy days, increasing the risk of accidents. Keeping your cat indoors eliminates this risk entirely.

2. Protection from Infectious Diseases

FIV (Feline Immunodeficiency Virus) and FeLV (Feline Leukemia Virus) are transmitted through fights or contact with stray cats. The coronavirus that causes FIP (Feline Infectious Peritonitis) can also be contracted from outdoor cats. Indoor living prevents these infections.

3. Parasite Prevention

The risk of parasite infections from fleas, ticks, roundworms, and tapeworms is dramatically reduced. This also saves on the cost and stress of preventive medications.

4. More Than Double the Average Lifespan

Data shows that indoor cats have an average lifespan of 15-20 years, compared to 7-10 years for cats that go outside. Keeping cats indoors significantly contributes to their longevity.

5. Prevention of Neighborhood Conflicts

You can completely avoid neighborhood disputes related to cats damaging others' gardens, waste issues, or noise complaints.

Keeping Indoor Cats Entertained

Encourage vertical movement with a cat tree, install a cat walkway by the window so they can enjoy the outside view, and set aside 15-30 minutes each day for playtime. With these efforts, your cat can lead a fulfilling indoor life.

Siberians are curious and playful cats, but they also have the adaptability to live comfortably in an indoor environment without stress.

zh.title: 完全室内饲养的5大好处：不让猫咪外出的理由
zh.content:
完全室内饲养是现代养猫推荐的方式。以下介绍五大好处。

1. 交通事故风险为零

交通事故是外出猫咪的主要死因之一。尤其是夜间和雨天能见度低，事故风险更高。完全室内饲养可以彻底消除这一风险。

2. 远离传染病

猫艾滋（FIV）和猫白血病（FeLV）会通过与流浪猫打架或接触而感染。导致猫传染性腹膜炎（FIP）的冠状病毒也有从室外猫咪感染的风险。室内饲养可以预防这些感染。

3. 预防寄生虫

感染跳蚤、蜱虫、蛔虫、绦虫等寄生虫的风险大幅降低。还能节省预防药物的费用和猫咪的压力。

4. 平均寿命延长2倍以上

数据显示，室内猫的平均寿命为15-20年，而外出猫仅为7-10年。室内饲养对猫咪的长寿有很大贡献。

5. 避免邻里纠纷

可以完全避免因猫咪破坏他人花园、排泄物问题、叫声投诉等引起的邻里纠纷。

室内也不让猫咪感到无聊的方法

用猫爬架促进上下运动，在窗边安装猫步道让猫咪欣赏户外风景，每天安排15-30分钟的玩耍时间。通过这些方法，室内生活也能过得充实。

西伯利亚猫是好奇心旺盛、爱玩耍的猫种，同时也具有在室内环境中无压力舒适生活的适应能力。
